snippet: The dances at Johnson’s Barn, a North Dakota institution since the 1950s, may be coming to an end.
abstract: Johnson's Barn, North Dakota institution that has been home to regular Friday night dances since early 1950s, is set to close; owner Brian Johnson, who has been diagnosed with Parkinson's disease, plans to sell farm and move to city; he hopes new owners will continue tradition that has become important part of rural communities in state.
lead_paragraph: The dances at Johnson’s Barn, a North Dakota institution since the 1950s, may be coming to an end.

headline.main: Johnson’s Barn, a North Dakota Institution, Plans Its Last Dance
headline.print_headline: A Night Out in the Barn
